Container.Name: lancache-bundle
Container.Overview:
An all in one lancache docker providing a combination of the following three projects: https://github.com/lancachenet/lancache-dns https://github.com/lancachenet/monolithic https://github.com/lancachenet/sniproxy
Thanks to cheesemarathon for their work on the SteamCacheBundle that inspired this and provided the grounding for the template. Note, however, that this Docker image does not run at all the same way and is strictly based on the original upstream logcache project.
On start, this image will download the latest domain list from https://github.com/uklans/cache-domains. This means no constant upgrading of the docker image is necessary in order to guarantee continued usability

Config.Name: LANCACHE_IP
Config.Description: IP Address of cache container. (Has to be the same as the HOST's IP. If you set the container's IP to 192.168.1.202 this has to be the same. If you use bridge it has to be the same as unRAID's IP.)

Config.Name: DNS_BIND_IP
Config.Description: IP Address of cache container. (Has to be the same as the HOST's IP. If you set the container's IP to 192.168.1.202 this has to be the same. If you use bridge it has to be the same as unRAID's IP.)

Config.Name: data
Config.Description: Location to store the cached files

Config.Name: DNS Logs
Config.Description: Location to store the DNS logs

Config.Name: Nginx Logs
Config.Description: Location to store the Nginx logs

Config.Name: CACHE_MEM_SIZE
Config.Description: Memory size for the cache

Config.Name: CACHE_DISK_SIZE
Config.Description: Max size for the cache

Config.Name: CACHE_MAX_AGE
Config.Description: Max age for files in the cache

Config.Name: DNS UDP Port
Config.Description: DNS port, don't change!

Config.Name: HTTP Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 80 Don't change!

Config.Name: HTTPS Port
Config.Description: Container Port: 443 SNIProxy port, don't change!

Config.Name: UPSTREAM_DNS
Config.Description: Container Variable: UPSTREAM_DNS

Config.Name: USE_GENERIC_CACHE
Config.Description: Must be set to true to use generic cache

Config.Name: DISABLE_ARENANET
Config.Description: Set to true to disable arenanet caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_BLIZZARD
Config.Description: Set to true to disable blizzard caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_CITYOFHEROES
Config.Description: Set to true to disable cityofheroes caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_DAYBREAK
Config.Description: Set to true to disable daybreak caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_EPICGAMES
Config.Description: Set to true to disable epicgames caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_FRONTIER
Config.Description: Set to true to disable frontier caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_HIREZ
Config.Description: Set to true to disable hirez caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_NEVERWINTER
Config.Description: Set to true to disable neverwinter caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_NEXUSMODS
Config.Description: Set to true to disable nexusmods caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_NINTENDO
Config.Description: Set to true to disable nintendo caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_ORIGIN
Config.Description: Set to true to disable origin caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_RENEGADEX
Config.Description: Set to true to disable renegadex caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_RIOT
Config.Description: Set to true to disable riot caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_ROCKSTAR
Config.Description: Set to true to disable rockstar caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_SONY
Config.Description: Set to true to disable sony caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_STEAM
Config.Description: Set to true to disable steam caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_TESO
Config.Description: Set to true to disable teso caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_TWITCH
Config.Description: Set to true to disable twitch caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_UPLAY
Config.Description: Set to true to disable uplay caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_WARFRAME
Config.Description: Set to true to disable warframe caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_WARGAMING
Config.Description: Set to true to disable wargaming caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_WSUS
Config.Description: Set to true to disable windowsupdates caching

Config.Name: DISABLE_XBOXLIVE
Config.Description: Set to true to disable xboxlive caching

Container.Description:
An all in one lancache docker providing a combination of the following three projects: https://github.com/lancachenet/lancache-dns https://github.com/lancachenet/monolithic https://github.com/lancachenet/sniproxy
Thanks to cheesemarathon for their work on the SteamCacheBundle that inspired this and provided the grounding for the template. Note, however, that this Docker image does not run at all the same way and is strictly based on the original upstream logcache project.
On start, this image will download the latest domain list from https://github.com/uklans/cache-domains. This means no constant upgrading of the docker image is necessary in order to guarantee continued usability
